News.headline: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v FC Halifax Town
News.page_title: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v FC Halifax Town
News.URL_keywords: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v FC Halifax Town
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Dagger's Emirates FA Cup 1st Round game against FC Halifax Town on Saturday 5th November.
News.description:
Don't miss out on our reduced prices for our Emirates FA Cup clash with FC Halifax Town where season tickets are not valid for cup games, so make sure you get your tickets for the game.

Please note that the Family Stand will be closed for this game and Junior & Under 10 tickets are reduced to £1.00 in advance but go up to £5.00 on the day.

Admission prices for the game:

Carling & TBS Stand:
Adults - £12.00 
Concessions - £8.00 
10-16 - £1.00* in advance £5.00 on the day 
Under 10's - £1.00* in advance £5.00 on the day 
*when purchased with an adult ticket. 

Terraces:
Adults - £10.00 
Concessions - £6.00 
10-16 - £1.00* in advance £5.00 on the day 
Under 10s - £1.00* in advance £5.00 on the day 
*when purchased with an adult ticket. 

Individual tickets can also be purchased on-line, on the phone and in the club shop. 

Purchase:
Online:www.daggerstickets.co.uk
Phone: 020 8592 1549 ext 21 
Club shop: Opening Times
